text: According to this rite, let them be sprinkled with the water of purification, and let them shave all the hairs of their flesh, and when they shall have washed their garments and are cleansed.

segments.text: According to this rite, let them be sprinkled with the water of purification, and let them
shave all the hairs of their flesh, and when they shall have washed their garments and are cleansed.
